article.author: Paradisus by Meliá
article.title: Embrace Your Nature
article.lead: Escape with this breathtaking collection of nature’s retreats by Paradisus by Meliá, luxury resorts faithful to the vibrant culture and the natural beauty of its destination.
article.embed: <iframe width="560" height="315" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/LGbfC7ByPsU?rel=0&showinfo=0" frameborder="0" allow="autoplay; encrypted-media" allowfullscreen></iframe>

article.author: Ya'lla World
article.title: Welcome to the Ya’lla World!
article.lead: An enticing glimpse of the wonders of Ya’lla World - Cuba, Egypt, Greece, Israel Jordan, Morocco, Oman, Turkey and UAE.
